job_description:
Design and development of visualizations for various reports/dashboards including near real-time to be shared with both B2B and B2C
Building complex data analytics and reporting for the improvement of dispatch operations, patient transports and cost savings
Architecting, design, and building of dynamic, real-time analytics pipelines and dashboards using visualization tools such as PowerBI
Writing Python and SQL script for custom Computer Aided Dispatch (CAD) installations
Writing Business Requirements Document, Data Sharing Agreements
Strong consulting skills to engage with all stakeholders, lead meetings with internal and external clients to gather and document business requirements

Skills

Experience and Skill Set Requirements Design and Development Experience

10+ years of technical data warehousing experience with a focus in the design and development of Business Intelligence
Experience with Azure Analysis Services / SSAS (tabular/multidimensional), SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS) and Cognos
Development of specification for Priority Dispatch System (MPDS) triage for system integration with CAD
End to end management of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) for Computer Aided Dispatch (CAD)
Developing process models and ongoing analysis of program effectiveness for Computer Aided Dispatch (CAD),
Building complex data analytics and reporting for the improvement of dispatch operations, patient transports and cost savings,
Demonstrated experience in design and data modeling of data warehouse (e.g. dimensional modeling), data cubes, tabular models to support reporting, both ad-hoc and "canned” reports.
Demonstrated the ability to critique and suggest improvements to existing data models
Demonstrated experience in design and development of data models for OLTP (On-line Transaction Processing) and OLAP (On-line Analytical Processing) environments based on industry best practices.
Demonstrated experience in design and development of ETL (Extract, transform, load) processes, and validating data sources
Demonstrated experience in responding to and troubleshooting issues related to data quality and performance and resolve them in a timely manner.
Demonstrated experience in design and development of visualizations for various reports/dashboards including near real-time to be shared with both B2B and B2C
Demonstrated the ability to create interactive near real-time dashboards (with drill-downs)
Demonstrated experience in architecting, design, and building of dynamic, real-time analytics pipelines and dashboards using visualization tools such as PowerBI
Demonstrated experience in building and deploying Mobile dashboards
Demonstrated experience in enabling role-based security in the reports by restricting access to information (record-based access) and reports 45% Technical Skills
10+ years of experience with developing code in SQL and Azure SQL. Experience in SQL performance and optimization
Familiar with SSAS Partitioning
Demonstrated experience with power query/power pivot, and being able to combine datasets from different sources
Writing Python and SQL script for custom Computer Aided Dispatch (CAD) installations
Familiar with M language and Python
Risk analysis for Computer Aided Dispatch (CAD), policy and procedures, and operational planning.
Demonstrated experience with Datafactory, On-Premise data gateway
Familiar with ADFS (Active Directory Federation Services).
Familiar with PowerBI best practices
Experience with and knowledge of UI Design Principles
Experience in SOAP and REST web services for processing real-time data streams
Experience in conducting unit testing and troubleshooting
Demonstrated experience in enabling role-based security in the reports by restricting access to information (record-based access) and reports
Demonstrated experience with deployment of Report into Azure infrastructure. 35% Communication Skills
Strong verbal and written communication skills that enable to effectively communicate ideas and concepts. Strong Interpersonal and negotiation skills.
Strong consulting skills to engage with all stakeholders, lead meetings with internal and external clients to gather and document business requirements.
Ability to work with minimal supervision in an agile environment, be an effective communicator with other team members and the business owners.
A demonstrated team player with a proven track record for meeting deadlines
Demonstrated experience in creating of conceptual, logical, and physical data documentation for knowledge retention and transfer. 20%

Must Have

Senior SQL Developer

SQL Server Reporting Services (SSRS)

Cognos

Azure SQL
